MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the DG7 postcode area of Castle Douglas and Dalbeattie. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:46pm due to reports of a grounded over head line near Craigton Farm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:05pm on Sunday, 18 October 2020
